title: Just got trolled by my own stats project....
body: had to copy and paste an image of data output into word, and I kept getting frustrated because it would just show a blank space where I had told it to paste... so I try 3 other ways to import/paste/load this image just to find out that the image was too large and had been posting correctly and had taken up 4 pages of me pasting and having it just add it into the next page. Word didn't adjust the screen to show me this, and the image apparently had a large white space above it, so I just wasted 15 minutes of my life, and am now sharing this on GD, so another 5. That is like smoking 3 cigarettes (7 minutes per according to every health class ever).
